channel.title: It says my Server Is Offline But i Forwarded the port and I am on The Server
channel.description:
Hi, I am new to server Creation, can someone please help by answering the following question?
When I Go to Register it, It says my Server Is Offline But i Forwarded the port and I am on The Server.
Whats Wrong?

item.title: It says my Server Is Offline But i Forwarded the port and I am on The Server

item.source: It says my Server Is Offline But i Forwarded the port and I am on The Server

item.title: It says my Server Is Offline But i Forwarded the port and I am on The Server
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

You have to port-forward the port your server is running on for every firewall you have. This includes your router, and firewall/antivirus programs such as Symantec Norton AntiVirus, McAfee, Zone Alarm, and even Windows Firewall. Also make sure the port you are port-forwarding is the correct one, and that you are telling people to use that one to login to your server. Another problem might be that you are giving them the wrong IP to your server, so I recommend getting No-ip at http://no-ip.com

Just make a no-ip and keep it up-to-date with your router’s IP address.

Read full topic
item.source: It says my Server Is Offline But i Forwarded the port and I am on The Server

I did that, What Now

ask someone to test using your ip go to no-ip.com and get a ip or go to http://www.whatsmyip.org and have someone try that ip.
